title: ettanai kONalaDi
sahitya:
ettanai kONalaDi Ezhai manamE


anupallavi

  piTTu koNDu kuDitta peria pEik-kurangu pOl kattik-kudikkinrAi kaN talai teriyAmal


caraNam 1    pU pOl aNaittuk-koNDAl tI pOla shuDuginrAi poyyinaik-kaNDittAl porumai izhakkinrAi
tAip-pAlukku virOdam tappAmal puriginrAi tangamE vA enrAl taLukkAga maraiginrAi 
    caraNam 2    nItiyillai enrE nIlik-kaNNIr vaDippAi nillu summA enrAl neLIndu nI naDippAi
nAthan azhaittapOdu bhUtanji sheiginrAi nalladu sonnAlum nAi pOlE vizhuginrAi
